about_the_game:
This DLC has 40 pages， including all related works of "The Last 47 Hours" scenario author who passed away.（R.I.P.）

Artworks of "The Last 47 Hours"
Artworks of "Your Smile beyond Twilight" (VN on Steam, DOES have English version)
Information of Maki in "The 9th Day" (AVG on Steam, DOES NOT have English version)
Artworks of "Love Polygon Report"(Chinese light novel)
Artworks of "School of Black City"(Chinese light novel)
